result.execSummary:
The defendant David C. Steffen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Marathon County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol, can take prescribed medications as directed by physician.  Subject to random testing to check for compliance.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

Complete any assessment, treatment, counseling deemed necessary by agent.  Complete AODA with follow through.  Complete mental health assessment with follow through.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Clerk: Kimberly

State appears by ADA Ralph Uttke.  Deft appears with Atty John Zich.

State moves to:

Ct. 1 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
15CM798:

PLEA:
15CM363:
Ct. 1 Disorderly Conduct >> NO CONTEST
15CM663:
Ct. 1 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> NO CONTEST
15CM798:
Ct. 1 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: w/hold sentencing. 1 year probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: Complete any assessment, counseling, or treatment deemed necessary by agent. Complete AODA assessment with follow through. Complete Mental Health assessment with follow through. Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol, can take prescriped medications as directed by physician. Subject to random testing to check for compliance. Deft is on disability and unable to maintain GFE. Pay CC. Pay DNA sample and surcharge. 78 days credit granted in 15CM798, 80 days credit granted in 15CM663, and 81 days credit granted in 15CM363. Deft is resident of Wood County and probation may be transferred to county of residence if county accepts deft.
